product_name: The North Face Metropolis Mittens - Women's
long_description: The North Face Metropolis mittens feature PrimaLoft(R) insulation for great warmth in winter weather. Ripstop nylon shells feature PrimaLoft insulation in the palms and Heatseeker(TM) insulation at the backs of the hands. 5 Dimensional Fit(TM) uses 5 measurements of the hand to construct mittens with an accurate and consistent fit. Grippy synthetic palms. The North Face Metropolis mittens have comfortable knit cuff gaskets to keep warmth in.
short_description: The North Face Metropolis mittens feature PrimaLoft(R) insulation for great warmth in winter weather.
